website_summaries.verdict: Asus slips a big screen into the thin body of the ZenBook 3 Deluxe, but the battery isn’t as upscale as the design.
pros: The Asus ZenBook 3 Deluxe is very slim and stylish
It fits a 14-inch screen into a compact body and includes a fingerprint reader
cons: There’s only a standard HD screen option

customer_reviews.title: It looks cool but nothing else
customer_reviews.text: I need to write a longer review. But already had to get it serviced. They sent me back I think my old laptop and it works, but everything was wiped clean. I tried calling them... This was my second Asus Zenbook that I've bought. It looks cool but nothing else. Over priced, if you're going to buy their product buy a cheaper one. Also it got slow FAST.
customer_reviews.author: Ravi Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Gets heated quickly
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for close to 3 years now, so these observations are over a period of time. 1. It gets heated quickly, so had to switch off regularly after 2-3 hours of use 2. Because of the heat, the screen stopped working. This was in the first year of buying, so it was replaced for free. 3. The heating problem continued so after a few months of replacing the screen, it stopped working again. I bought a secondary display, so primarily used it as a desktop. 4. All connection is of type c (i was using it in India). So had to use adapter for everything (screen, external hard disk, mouse, keyboard) It's definitely not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Fareen S

customer_reviews.title: Extremely delicate laptop
customer_reviews.text: The battery durability is amazing, so is light weight and the thinness. But I accidentally “smashed the screen” while it was closed (barely touched it) and never worked on again. When I took it to the customer service, they said they couldn’t open it cause the display was so thin than it could break all the parts complety
customer_reviews.author: Victor Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Monitor not functioning...
customer_reviews.text: It's about 6 months only and the monitor stop working... It's my first time to buy Asus brand laptop. Anyone facing same issue?
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Laptop screen / graphics card
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is fast, thin and light and I really enjoy(ed) using it. UNFORTUNATELY.... the screen/graphics card stopped working before the laptop was 1 yr old. ASUS Tech Support repaired it by replacing the components. But now, the screen is once again not turning on which means, the replaced/repaired component has also failed... on a 2 year old laptop that was/is not cheap. I would not recommend purchasing this laptop - it's much too expensive to have repeat problems of this nature when the laptop is only 2 yrs old.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Correia

customer_reviews.title: Went Dark  Jan 18, 2019
customer_reviews.text: I gave 1 star because I was expecting for this laptop to last a bit longer. After a 1yr+ of use, it went dark. I mostly used it for admin type of tasks (word doc, ppt, xls, etc.) The laptop was typically on the desk, didn't travel with it, so it was pretty stationery. Apparently the screen malfunctioned (per GeekSquad's assessment) but it wouldn't even worked when connected to a monitor. It appears GeekSquad was not able to obtain necessary parts to repair it (after 7 weeks!). This is why I wouldn't recommend getting this model because it seems once it's down, it is down. Very disappointed. This is a slick laptop when it works.
customer_reviews.author: Casey P.

customer_reviews.title: SSD Hard drive failed!
customer_reviews.text: SSD Hard drive failed 5 months after warranty ended. I used to think Zenbooks were some of the best laptops. The one I got in 2012 still works great but the one I got in 2018 didn't even make it 18 months. I guess they're getting cheaper parts to make it past warranty and have given up brand reputation.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Covered by Asus support
customer_reviews.text: I would like to updated my review. My wife just loves it is small and portable and it is a 14 inch. We got the computer from Amazon by the seller "Computer Upgrade King" and after 4 months the screen stopped working. It worked by connecting the laptop to a monitor. We got in touch with Amazon and they redirect us to Asus. Asus helped us and replaced the screen now the laptop works fine. In brief we are happy to have the laptop back and that it works.

customer_reviews.title: I love this computer when I first got it
customer_reviews.text: I love this computer when I first got it. It is light weight, thin, charges super fast, great resolution, finger print recognition, screen is big enough. I love everything about this lab top until my 28th day of used. The screen went black on me and I cannot turn it back on. I thought my lab top has this problem. I realized I am not the only one. Beware of the screen went black. I had another Asus and that one works great for the past 3 years.

customer_reviews.title: I am happier with this unit over my Surface Pro 4 that ...
customer_reviews.text: I have owned and purchased a lot of computers, I am the IT Manager for the company I work for and purchase many computers all the time. I have decided to give this a try as an alternative to the Surface Pro that we have been buying since the Surface Pro 3's came out. I am happier with this unit over my Surface Pro 4 that I had. Being portable and on the go I do not like the balancing act with the attached keyboard. I do not always have an ideal place to set my surface down and use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super NOISY, makes more noise than my 15.6inch UX501VW ASUS laptop...
customer_reviews.text: I have always been an avid fan of ASUS products, this is the 4th laptop I have purchased from them and what a disappointment is to be listening to this "jet engine" going on even the PC is idling right of the box with no apps installed and in a room with AC cooled to 21C. How is it possible this little fan doing nothing makes more noise than my UX501VW running games? I'm so disappointed with ASUS, they make nice stuff, but they ALWAYS drop the ball in some mayor way. The laptop is awesome and well built and has great specs but the fan noise really is a deal breaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M.

customer_reviews.title: Root Cause Defective Model
customer_reviews.text: I returned this laptop 2 times due to bad battery not holding charge and speakers malfunctioning. The 3rd unit that I received the display went black after 6 months. So it went to ASUS factory for repair "Unfortunately". It took them more than 3 months to get the parts. Horrific warranty practices, it was a nightmare to deal with Customer Support. Unbelievably a BAD company. I do not recommend this laptop and ASUS as a company. LOTS of bad practises.. Go elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: b555

customer_reviews.title: I got a lemon
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most beautiful looking laptops available. Mine arrive and powered up once. To my disappointment, it never powered up after that. I don't know the reason it would not charge or power-up, it simply didn't work so I returned it. I have no reason to believe they are all bad. I simply needed it to work reliably and mine didn't. Based on my experience, I cannot reccommend this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: CLA

customer_reviews.title: great lightweight laptop for travel
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses this for travel now as I replaced it with a larger version for use at home as my laptop. The weight on this is nothing. Its really thin. The battery life is good even with not being used on a daily basis.

customer_reviews.title: screen blank  after 10 month
customer_reviews.text: this was the "perfect" tool up to 10 days ago when suddenly the screen went OFF. No reason for it apparently. I brought the laptop to the repair center where they found out that the cable connecting the MB to the screen was damaged. As no possibility to replace the cable only, they had to replace the full lid containing the screen.. luckily it was still under warranty but what if.....after all is clearly a design error and they should recall and fix this problem on all units. Worried for what could happen in the next month...

product_meta.title: ASUS UX490UA-XS74-BL 14-Inch Zenbook 3 Deluxe Notebook Core i7, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, Fingerprint Sensor, Windows Pro, Royal Blue
product_meta.description: Zenbook 3 Deluxe achieves the almost-impossible, featuring a gorgeous 14-inch display in an elegant and compact chassis that's no bigger than many 13-inch laptops. It's an unrivaled combination of power and beauty, giving you the perfect balance between portability and productivity. Measuring just 12.9mm thin and weighing only 1.1kg, zenbook 3 Deluxe has everything you need for superb on-the-go performance, including a 7th generation Intel Core i7 processor, 512GB PCIe SSD, two USB Type-C (USB-C) ports with Thunderbolt 3 for dual 4K UHD display supports, and a powerful quad-speaker audio system. Zenbook 3 Deluxe takes zenbook 3 to the next level - for the ultimate Prestige and performance. *The actual transfer speed of USB 3.0, 3.1 (Gen 1 and 2), and/or Type-C will vary depending on many factors including the processing speed of the host device, file attributes and other factors related to system configuration and your operating environment.

Latest 7th-Generation Kaby lake Intel Core i7-7500U Processor 2.7 GHz (Turbo to 3.5 GHz) cooled by copper-alloy heat pipe and liquid-crystal-polymer fan
14-Inch Full HD display with 178° viewing angles encased in Corning Gorilla Glass 5. Ultra-slim bezel at only 7.46mm
